[UserContext-mcp-extension](../../../modules.md) / [shared/env](../README.md) / getCacheDirectoryName

# Function: getCacheDirectoryName()

> **getCacheDirectoryName**(): `string`

Defined in: [src/shared/env.ts:24](https://github.com/ErikPlachta/vscode-extension-mcp-server/blob/566183273bc118fc1cea1f3b93a5f9fe451722a2/src/shared/env.ts#L24)

Compute the cache directory name based on the extension name.
This is used for both workspace-local and global cache folder naming.

## Returns

`string`

Directory name to use for cache storage.
